reviewText: Because we love the Big Red Boat CD so much, I decided to try out the show and got this for my almost-2 and almost-5 year old. They both love it and want to see it over and over. Cute songs, cute dances, little skits--I like it too! It engages them with interactive dances and responses, unlike the much lamer later shows that are nothing more than spliced together music videos.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Well, judging from all the other reviewers, this DVD should stink.  Hasn't anyone out there ever heard of a greatest hits DVD and/or CD?  Someone mentioned below that these guys travel extensively and make a ton of money doing that.  Guess what? That ISN'T where the money is in the music biz.  It's right here in the produced effect.  Besides, touring stinks, let me tell you from experience, and a totally horrific way to make a living.  But, when you sign your name on the dotted line at the record companies, they own you and you have to do it.  If you're disgusted with this DVD, then blame good old Hit Entertainment.  They're your cash cow.  The touring, producing, recording and writing schedule these guys keep is absolutely insane.  No recored company should be doing what Hit does to these guys.  So, give the Wiggles a break.  It's all about the money for the record companies and they really don't give a flying finger about why the artist made it big in the first place.  Unfortunately, I was hoping this wouldn't happen to the Wiggles but with their schedule, you just can't do everything.  This DVD isn't that bad.  It's good for the folks new to their music because quite frankly, Dance Party is REALLY old.  Greg's only about 21 there!  It needed to be redone because the songs are pretty cute.  Don't worry, after a year off I'm sure they'll be back in full form.  If you've ever lived a life like that you'd definitely need a break now and then and that's what these "greatest hits" albums do.  They provide income for the label and a break for the artist.  Hang in there all you Wiggle fans, they'll be back in full force for the next one!  And, I definitely recommend this DVD!
summary: Great CD for a Greatest Hits

reviewText: This is a great video. I have 3 boys and they all love it. If your a wiggle fan you will enjoy it. If you don't enjoy the video then your not a *true* wiggle fan. And I'll have to say we are fans;)

reviewText: Great songs, the sound quality wasn't good at all, you turn it up to hear the main singer of that song, then the chorus blew you out of the room...sounded very muffled, but video is great!!
summary: Here comes the big red car
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was very disappointed with this DVD, the songs were the same. But, I HATED that fact that they didn't have any children dancing to the songs as they sange.  They have the Wiggle dancers (Leeanne, and the rest of the adults).  We enjoy the Wiggles, but we enjoy watching the children dance and perform when they sing.  I was very disappointed.  My favorite Wiggle DVD is the Live Concert one.  We watch that one all the time. Check the Wiggles website, they are having more concerts for 2006.
summary: The Wiggles Here comes the Big red Car
Title: N/A

reviewText: We have four wonderful Wiggles DVDs (we even like the puppets on Yummy Yummy). I borrowed Big Red Car from the library today and it will be going back tomorrow. I once owned Sailing Around the World, but do not have it anymore. Let's just say I did not give it away to anyone else. At least half of the Big Red Car feature is composed of songs and skits by the Captain and his crew, very much like SATW, and those segments are just irritating. This gets 2 stars only because the first few songs actually feature the guys themselves with many songs we don't have already on our other DVDs. I will not rent, borrow, or buy this DVD again.
Title: N/A
